solitaire

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • solitaire.Card

  • class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes the card model

    • Method Detail

      • getCard

        static java.lang.String getCard(java.lang.String[] deck,
                                int cnt)
        This method takes a card from the deck
        Parameters:
        deck - the shuffled deck of cards
        cnt - ordinal index of the card that is taken from the deck
        Returns:
        a card taken from the deck

      • putOnField

        static java.lang.String[][] putOnField(java.lang.String[][] playingField,
                                       int slotNumber,
                                       java.lang.String takenCard)
        This method puts a card on the main slots of the playing field
        Parameters:
        playingField - current state of the playing field
        slotNumber - slot number selected by the player
        takenCard - the card to put on the field
        Returns:
        playing field with a placed card

      • putInPile

        static java.lang.String[] putInPile(java.lang.String[] pile,
                                    int slotNumber,
                                    java.lang.String takenCard)
        This method puts the card in the discard pile
        Parameters:
        pile - current state of the discard pile
        slotNumber - slot number selected by the player
        takenCard - the card to put in the discard pile
        Returns:
        the discard pile with a placed card
